name: annualreport
description: This is an addon starter template for the [Ionic Framework](http://ionicframework.com/).

scripts.setup: npm install && touch .env && NODE_ENV=production pm2 start server.js --name kmartinezmedia.com/pei-annual-report
scripts.production: git pull && NODE_ENV=production pm2 restart kmartinezmedia.com/pei-annual-report --update-env
